member.name: T:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Number
member.summary: Defines a data type for numbers. The number is implemented with BigInteger so can store very large values. All arithmetic operations are supported. The Number instance wraps a BigInteger and make it reference type.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Number.#ctor(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the Number class with specified value. That constructor is private beacause the implicit conversion operators exists. Only those operators should be used to create new instances and only those operators uses that constructor.
member.param: The value of the number.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Number.Finalize
member.summary: Releases the resources used by the Number instance.

member.summary: Sums another number to this number.
member.param: The other number to sum.

member.summary: Sums another number to this number.
member.param: The other number to sum.

member.summary: Subtracts another number from this number.
member.param: The other number to subtract.

member.summary: Divides this number by another number.

member.summary: Gets the reminder of this number divided by another number.

member.summary: Gets the reminder of this number divided by another number.
member.param: The other number to get the reminder by.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Number.DivisionReminder(CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Number)
member.summary: Gets the division and reminder of this number divided by another number.

member.summary: Gets the division and reminder of this number divided by another number.
member.param: The other number to divide by.
member.returns: Tuple where the first item is the division result and the second item is the reminder.

member.summary: Indicates to the Garbage Collector not to call the destructor(the finalizer).

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Number.ToString
member.summary: Returns the string representation of the number.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Number.CompareTo(CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Number)
member.summary: Compares this number to another number.
member.param: The other number to compare to.
member.returns: 1 if this number is greater than the other number, 0 if they are equal, and -1 if this number is less than the other number.

member.summary: Checks if this number is equal to another number.

member.summary:

member.summary:

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Pair`2.Value
member.summary:
EN: Gets the value of the key-value pair.
BG: Достъпва стойността на двойката ключ-стойност.

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Pair`2.KeyAndValue
member.summary:
EN: Returns the key and the value as tuple.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Pair`2.#ctor(`0,`1)
member.summary:
EN: Creates new key-value pair with the specified key and value.
BG: Създава нова двойка ключ-стойност с указаните ключ и стойност.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Pair`2.ReturnAsString
member.summary:

BG: Връща ключа и стойността на двойката ключ-стойност конкатенирани с разделител като текст (string).

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Pair`2.ToString
member.summary: Converts the key value pair to a string.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Pair`2.Clone
member.summary:
EN: Clones the pair. Returns it like an object;
BG: Клонира двойката ключ-стойност, като я връща като обект, който да бъде конвертиран (кастнат).
member.returns: EN: The pair as object. BG: Дойката ключ-стойност като обект.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text
member.summary: The Text represent a data type for text with the same characteristics as a String but with the difference that the Text is mutable and uses a list for buffer. The Text provides faster operation because there is no creation of a new text every time when concatenating, removing, replacing etc.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.EmptyText
member.summary: Defines empty text.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.WhiteSpace
member.summary: Defines a white space.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.NewLine
member.summary: Defines a new line character.

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the symbol at the specified index in the text.
member.param: The index of the symbol in the text.
member.returns: The symbol at the specified index in the text.

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Length
member.summary: Gets the count of the symbols of the text.

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Symbols
member.summary: Gets the array with the symbols of the text.

member.summary: Creates new text with the symbols from the specified array. The constructor is public but it is preferred to use the operator '=' to accept value.
member.param: The array with the symbols for the text.

member.summary: The finalizer is used to release all the resources of the text.

member.summary: Concatenates the specified text with the current text.

member.summary: Concatenates the specified text with the current text.
member.param: The text to be appendet to the current text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Concatenate(System.Char)
member.summary: Concatenates the specified symbol with the current text.
member.param: The symbol to be appendet to the current text.

member.summary: Removes the specified text from the current text, if the specified text exists in the current text.
member.param: The text to be removed.

member.summary: Removes the specified text from the current text, if the specified text exists in the current text.

The ending index.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Remove(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a symbol from the text at the specified index.
member.param: The index of the symbol to be removed.

member.summary: Checks if the specified text exists in the current text.
member.param: The text to be checked.
member.returns: True if the current text contains the specified text, otherwise False.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.ContainsText(System.Char)
member.summary: Checks if the specified symbol exists in the current text.
member.param: The symbol to be checked.
member.returns: True if the current text contains the specified symbol, otherwise False.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Clear
member.summary: Clears the text.

member.summary: Inserts the specified text at the specified intex in the current text.

member.summary: Inserts the specified text at the specified intex in the current text.

The array of symbols to be inserted at that index.

member.summary: Concatenates the symbols from the text with the specified separator between each of them.
member.param: The separator.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.JoinBy(CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text)
member.summary: Concatenates the symbols from the text with the specified separator between each of them.
member.param: The separator.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.JoinBy(System.Char)
member.summary: Concatenates the symbols from the text with the specified separator between each of them.
member.param: The separator.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.SplitBy(System.Char,CommonLibrary.Enums.SplitType)
member.summary: Splits the text by the given separator and uses the specified splitting type. To specify the split type you should use a flag from the SplitType enumeration as follows: - Use flag ClearOutput to specify that the the empty strings created sometimes when splitting should be removed from the output. - Use flag KeepAllEntries to specify that the empty string should be left in the output.
member.param: The separator.
The type of splitting.
member.returns: An array with the splatted text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.SplitBy(System.String,CommonLibrary.Enums.SplitType)
member.summary: Splits the text by the given separator and uses the specified splitting type. To specify the split type you should use a flag from the SplitType enumeration as follows: - Use flag ClearOutput to specify that the the empty strings created sometimes when splitting should be removed from the output. - Use flag KeepAllEntries to specify that the empty string should be left in the output.
member.param: The separator.
The type of splitting.
member.returns: An array with the splatted text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.SplitBy(CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text,CommonLibrary.Enums.SplitType)
member.summary: Splits the text by the given separator and uses the specified splitting type. To specify the split type you should use a flag from the SplitType enumeration as follows: - Use flag ClearOutput to specify that the the empty strings created sometimes when splitting should be removed from the output. - Use flag KeepAllEntries to specify that the empty string should be left in the output.
member.param: The separator.
The type of splitting.
member.returns: An array with the splatted text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.SplitBy(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},CommonLibrary.Enums.SplitType)
member.summary: Splits the text by the given separators. To specify the split type you should use a flag from the SplitType enumeration as follows: - Use flag ClearOutput to specify that the the empty strings created sometimes when splitting should be removed from the output. - Use flag KeepAllEntries to specify that the empty string should be left in the output.
member.param: The separators for split.
The type of the splitting.
member.returns: An array with the splatted text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Cut(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Cuts a piece from the text.
member.param: The starting index.
The ending index.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Replace(System.Int32,System.Int32,CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text)
member.summary: Replaces the symbol in the specified range in the text with the symbols from the specified replacement text.
member.param: The start index.
The ending index.
The replacement text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Replace(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the symbol in the specified range in the text with the symbols from the specified replacement text.
member.param: The start index.
The ending index.
The replacement text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Trim(CommonLibrary.Enums.TrimOrigin)
member.summary: Trims the white spaces from the beginning or the end of the text. The position for the trim operation should be specified with a flag from the TrimOrigin enumeration. Use flag Beginning to specify to trim the beginning of the text. Use flag End to specify to trim the end of the text. Note that if there are more that one white spaces they all will be removed.
member.param: The position for trim.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.IndexOf(CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text)
member.summary: Finds the index of the first occurence of the first symbol of the specified text in the current text.
member.param: The text which index need to be found.
member.returns: The index of the first occurence of the first symbol of the specified text or -1 if there is no mathces.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.IndexOf(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the index of the first occurence of the first symbol of the specified text in the current text.
member.param: The text which index need to be found.
member.returns: The index of the first occurence of the first symbol of the specified text or -1 if there is no mathces.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.IndexOf(System.Char)
member.summary: Finds the index of the first occurence of the symbol in the current text.
member.param: The symbol which index need to be found.
member.returns: The index of the first occurence of the symbol in the text or -1 if there is no mathces.

member.summary: Finds the index of the last occurense of the first symbol of the specified text.
member.param: The text which index should be found.
member.returns: The index of the last occurence of the first symbol of the specified text or -1 if there are no matches.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.LastIndexOf(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the index of the last occurense of the first symbol of the specified text.
member.param: The text which index should be found.
member.returns: The index of the last occurence of the first symbol of the specified text or -1 if there are no matches.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.LastIndexOf(System.Char)
member.summary: Finds the index of the last occurense of the symbol in the text.
member.param: The symbol which index should be found.
member.returns: The index of the last occurence of the symbol or -1 if there are no matches.

member.summary: Overrides ToString() method to use the text content when using the variable.

member.summary: Returns the text as a StingBuilder.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.ToCharList
member.summary: Returns the text as a list of characters.

member.summary: Converts the text to data stream. The data stream defines an array of bytes of the text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.ToUpperCase
member.summary: Converts the symbols of the text to upper case symbols.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.CompareTo(CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text)
member.summary: Compare two texts.
member.param: The other text to compare to.
member.returns: Less than zero - this text precedes the other in the sort order. Zero - both texts has same order and symbols. Greater than zero - this text follows the other in the sort order.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Compare the text with another text.
member.param: The other text to compare to.
member.returns: True if bot text are equal, otherwise False.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.GetHashCode
member.summary: GetHashCode method helps the text acting normal in collections like Dictionary and HashSet.
member.returns: The hash code of the text.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Clone
member.summary: Returns the text as object, so can be cloned or casted.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.AbstractDataTypes.Text.Dispose
member.summary: Indicates to the Garbage Collector not to call the destructor of the text(there are no resources to be disposed) to save time and to improve the performance.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Enums.BitState
member.summary:
EN: Provides flags that indicate the state of the bit at the given position in the "ChangeBitAt()" method in the BinaryHelper class.
BG: Предоставя флагове за състоянието на даден бит за "ChangeBitAt()" метода в класа BinaryHelper.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Enums.BitState.SwitchOn
member.summary:
EN: Indicates that the bit should be switched on.
BG: Индикира, че бита трябва да бъде включен, тоест да присвой стойност 1.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Enums.BitState.SwitchOff
member.summary:
EN: Indicates that the bit should be switched off.
BG: Индикира, че бита трябва да бъде изключен, тоест да присвой стойност 0.

member.summary: Provides positions for modules in a modular array.

member.summary: Indicates the first module in the array.

member.summary: Indicates the last module in the array.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Enums.SortingOptions
member.summary:
EN: Provides options for sorting.
BG: Предоставя опций за сортиране.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Enums.SortingOptions.Ascending
member.summary:
EN: Default sorting - ascending.
BG: Възходящо сортиране (по подразбиране).

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Enums.SortingOptions.Descending
member.summary:
EN: Descending sorting.
BG: Низходящо сортиране.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Enums.SplitType
member.summary:
EN: Specifies the splitting style, when a string is splatted by separator. Use NoEmptyStrings to remove the empty entries that can occur when splitting. Use KeepEmptyStrings to keep the empty entries.
BG: Указва начина на разделяне на стринг по разделител. Използвай флага NoEmptyStrings за да се премахнат празните стрингове, който могат да се получат при разделянето. Изплозвай флага KeepEmptyStrings за да запазиш празните стрингове.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Enums.SplitType.ClearOutput
member.summary:
EN: Indicates that the empty strings, created when splitting should be removed.
BG: Индикира, че празните стрингове, получени при разделяне, трябва да бъдат премахнати от резултата.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Enums.SplitType.KeepAllEntries
member.summary:
EN: Indicates that the empty strings, created when splitting should be saved.
BG: Индикира, че празните стрингове, получени при разделяне по разделител, трябва да бъдат добавени в резултата.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Enums.TrimOrigin
member.summary: Provides flags to indicate the position in a text/string for trim operation.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Enums.TrimOrigin.Beginning
member.summary: Specified the beginning of the text.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Enums.TrimOrigin.End
member.summary: Specifies the end of the text.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Exceptions.Error
member.summary:
EN: Defines common error. The default exception for everything.
BG: Представлява обща грешка. Може да се третира като грешка по подразбиране и да се използва по всякакви поводи.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Exceptions.Error.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
EN: Creates new Error with the specified error message.
BG: Създава нов Error със указаното съобщение за грешка.
member.param: EN: The message. BG: Съобщението.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Exceptions.SyntaxException
member.summary:
EN: Indicates when some member value (Property or Field, Parameter..) is not typed correct. The check of the syntax is made with a regular expression.
BG: Индикира когато стойността на даден член на класа (свойство, поле, параметър..) е с непозволен синтаксис. Извършва се проверка на синтаксиса с регулярен израз.

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.Exceptions.SyntaxException.ErrorMessage
member.summary:
EN: Get or set the message that exception shows.
BG: Достъпва съобщението за грешка, което се показва.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Exceptions.SyntaxException.#ctor
member.summary:
EN: Create new SyntaxException with default error message.
BG: Създава нов SyntaxException със съобщение за грешка по подразбиране.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Exceptions.SyntaxException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
EN: Create new SyntaxException with specified error message.
BG: Създава нов SytanxException със зададено съобщение за грешка.
member.param: EN: The message for the exception. BG: Съобщението за грешка.

member.summary: Checks of the specified string is empty.

member.returns: True if the text has no characters, otherwise False.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Helpers.BinaryHelper
member.summary:
EN: Provides set of static methods for converting strings, numbers and etc. to binary string.
BG: Предоставя набор от статични методи за конвертиране на текст, числа и т.н. в двойчен стринг. Двойчния стринг преставлява двойчно число под формата на стринг.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.BinaryHelper.ConvertIntToBinary(System.Int32)
member.summary:
EN: Converts the number to a binary string.
BG: Конвертира числото в двойчен стринг.
member.param: EN: The number to be converted. BG: Числото, което ще се конвертира.
member.returns: EN: Binary string. BG: Двойчен стринг.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.BinaryHelper.ConvertBinaryToInt(System.String)
member.summary:
EN: Converts the binary string to a integer.
BG: Конвертира двойчния стринг в цяло число.
member.param: EN: The binary string to be converted. BG: Двойчния стринг, който ще се конвертира.
member.returns: EN: Integer. BG: Цяло число, получено от двойчния стринг.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.BinaryHelper.ChangeBitAt(System.Int32,System.Int32,CommonLibrary.Enums.BitState)
member.summary:
EN: Changes the bit at the given position. The first index in the binary is the last bit. The index is incremented at every nex bit, but the direction of indexing is from left to rigth. The state of the bit is indicated by a flag from the enumeration "BitState". Use flag "SwitchOn" to switch on the bit(set the value to 1). Use flag "SwitchOff" to switch off the bit(set the value to 0).
BG: Променя състоянието на даден бит на дадена позиция. Позициятя на бита е неговия индекс в машинния код. Индекирането става от ляво на дясно, тоест на индекс 0 е последния бит. Състоянието на бита се указва с флаг от еномерацията "BitState". Използвай флага "SwitchOn" за да вкючиш бита(да му зададеш стойност 1). Използвай флага "SwitchOff" за да изкючиш бита(да му зададеш стойност 0).
member.param: EN: The number. BG: Числото.
EN: The position of the bit in the number. BG: Позицията на бита в числото(в машинния му код).
BG: The state of the bit. BG: Съзтоянието на бита. Дали да е включен или не.
member.returns: EN: The result as new integer. BG: Резултата като цяло число.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.BinaryHelper.CreateBinary(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a binary(.bin) file with the given text.
member.param: The text of the file.
The location of the binary - where to be created.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.BinaryHelper.SplitToBinaries(System.String,System.String,System.Byte)
member.summary: Splits the file content to several binary files.
member.param: The location of the file.
The folder where the binaries will be saved.
The count of the binaries.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.BinaryHelper.ShowMessageWindow(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Shows a message window with the specified message and title.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper
member.summary:
EN: Provides static methods for searching and editing a collection.
BG: Предоставя набор от статични методи за манипулиране на колекция или масив.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper.FindElementThat``1(System.Predicate{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
EN: Checks every element in the collection and extracts the one that matches the Predicate.
BG: Проверява всеки елемент в колекцията и връща първия, който отговаря на условието. Ако няма съвпадения, връща стойност по подразбиране.
member.param: EN: The Predicate with the condition. BG: Предикатът с условието.
EN: The collection whose elements will be iterated. BG: Колекцията, чиито елементи ще бъдат итерирани.
member.returns: EN: The first matching element or default value if there is no match. BG: Първият съвпадащ елемент или стойност по подразбиране, ако няма съвпадения.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper.FindElementsThat``1(System.Predicate{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
EN: Checks every element in the collection and extracts all that match the Predicate.
BG: Проверява всеки елемент и връща всички, които отговарят на условието. Ако няма съвпадения, връща масив със стойности по подразбиране.
member.param: EN: The Predicate with the condition. BG: Предикатът с условието.
EN: The collection whose elements will be checked. BG: Колекцията, чиито елементи ще бъдат проверени.
member.returns: EN: Array of matching elements or array of default values if no matches found. BG: Масив от съвпадащи елементи или стойности по подразбиране, ако няма съвпадения.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper.ExecuteOnEachElement``1(System.Action{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
EN: Iterates over the collection and executes the method on each element.
BG: Обхожда колекцията и изпълнява метода върху всеки елемент.
member.typeparam: EN: The data type of the method parameter and the collection elements. BG: Типът на параметъра и елементите в колекцията.
member.param: EN: The method to execute. BG: Методът, който ще се изпълни.
EN: The collection to iterate. BG: Колекцията, която ще се обхожда.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper.ExecuteOnEachElement(System.Action{System.Object},System.Object[])
member.summary:
EN: Iterates over the object array and executes the method on each element.
BG: Обхожда масив от обекти и изпълнява метода върху всеки от тях.
member.param: EN: The method to execute. BG: Методът, който ще се изпълни.
EN: The array of objects to iterate. BG: Масивът от обекти, който ще се обхожда.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper.ConvertToObjectArray``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
EN: Converts a collection to an array of objects.
BG: Преобразува колекцията в масив от обекти.
member.param: EN: The collection to convert. BG: Колекцията, която ще се преобразува.
member.returns: EN: Array of objects. BG: Масив от обекти.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper.CountOfMatches``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Predicate{``0})
member.summary:
EN: Counts the elements that match a condition in the collection.
BG: Брои елементите, които отговарят на условието в колекцията.
member.typeparam: EN: The data type of the elements. BG: Типът на елементите.
member.param: EN: The collection to check. BG: Колекцията, която ще се проверява.
EN: The condition to match. BG: Условието, което трябва да се изпълни.
member.returns: EN: Number of matching elements. BG: Броя на съвпадащите елементи.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper.CreateFromAnother``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary:
EN: Creates an array with the copied elements from another array and with capacity equals the count of the elements.
BG: Създава нов масив с копирани елементи от външния масив и капацитет равен на бройката на елементите.
member.param: EN: The extern collection witch elements will be copied. BG: Външната колекция, чийто елементи да бъдат копирани.
member.returns: EN: Array with the copied elements as IEnumerable. BG: Масив с копираните елементи като IEnumerable.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.CollectionHelper.SortArrayBy``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},CommonLibrary.Enums.SortingOptions)
member.summary:
EN: Sorts the collection by specified sorting options and returns it sortet. The options for sorting should be specified with a flag from SprtingOptions enumeration. Use SortingOptions.Ascending to sort the collection ascending. Use SortingOptions.Descending to sort the collecion descending.
BG: Сортира указаната колекция с указаните опций за сортиране. Режима на сортиране трябва да бъде указан с флаг от еномерацията SortingOptions. Използвай SortingOptions.Ascending за да сортираш колекцията възходящо. Използвaй SortingOptions.Descending за да сортираш колекцията низходящо.
member.typeparam: EN: The data type of the elements in the collection. BG: Типът данни на елементите в колекцията.
member.param: EN: The collection to be sorted. BG: Колекцията, която да бъде сортирана.
EN: The sorting options. BG: Опцийте за сортиране.
member.returns: EN: The same collection, but sorted. BG: Връща колекцията, но сортирана по желания начин.

member.summary: Clears the collection.
member.typeparam: The data type of the elements in the collection.
member.param: The collection to be cleared.

The value to be searched.
member.returns: The index of the found value or -1 if not found.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Helpers.Encryptor
member.summary:
EN: Provides set of static methods for encrypting and decrypting file content with a key. The encryptor encrypts a file by iterating over all symbols of the file content and apply XOR (^) bitwise operation with the key with each of them. The decrypting operation is the same as encryption. The key for the encryption and decryption processes can be set by the "Key" property.
BG: Предоставя набор от статични методи за криптиране и декриптиране на съдържание на файл с ключ. Крипторът шифрира файл, като обхожда всички символи от съдържанието на файла и прилага побитова операция XOR (^) (побитово изключващо ИЛИ) с ключа върху всеки от тях. Операцията по декриптиране е същата като при криптиране. Ключа за шифроване и дешифроване може да бъде достъпен и променен от свойството "Key" на класа.

member.name: F:CommonLibrary.Helpers.Encryptor._key
member.summary:
EN: The key for the encryptiong.
BG: Ключа за шифроване.

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.Helpers.Encryptor.Key
member.summary:
EN: Gets or sets the key for the encyption and decryption processes.
BG: Достъпва или променя ключа за шифроване и дешифроване.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.Encryptor.Encrypt(System.String)
member.summary:
EN: Encrypts the content of the file.
BG: Шифрира указания файл.
member.param: EN: The directory of the file in the system. BG: Директорията на файла в системата.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.Encryptor.Decrypt(System.String)
member.summary:
EN: Decripts a file, encrypted with the same encryptor - the current data type.
BG: Дешифрова файл, шифриран с текущия криптор.
member.param: ЕN: The directory of the file in the system. BG: Директорията на файла в системата.

member.name: T:CommonLibrary.Helpers.NumberGenerator
member.summary:
EN: Generator of random numbers. Provides methods for generating random number, or sequence of random numbers, in diapason of starting number and ending number. The range of the diapason shoul be defined with the creation of the generator, and can be accessed or changed with the Start and the End properties.
BG: Генератор на случайни номера. Предоставя необходимите методи за генериране на случаен номер или поредица от случайни номера, в диапазон от стартово число и крайно число. Началото и края на диапазона за генериране на числа трябва да бъдат указани в началото със създаването на генератора. В по късен етап могад да бъдат достъпени или промемени чрез свойтвата Start и End на класа.

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.Helpers.NumberGenerator.Start
member.summary:
EN: Gets or sets the start of the diapason for generating.
BG: Достъпва началото на диапазона за генериране на числа.

member.name: P:CommonLibrary.Helpers.NumberGenerator.End
member.summary:
EN: Gets or sets the end of the diapason for generating.
BG: Достъпва края на диапазона за генериране на числа.

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.NumberGenerator.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
EN: Creates new generator of random numbers, инт the diapason for generating from "start" to "end".
BG: Създава нов генератор на случайни номера в указания диапазон. В този случай генератора генерира число или поредица от числа в диапазон от "start" до "end".

member.name: M:CommonLibrary.Helpers.NumberGenerator.Generate
member.summary:
EN: Generates random number in the specified diapason.
BG: Генерира случаен номер в зададения диапазон.
